entry.title: Voting (BIP-100) Question, Etc.
entry.summary: Miners are voting on BIP 100 and the BIP will be submitted with implementation in the next two weeks. The voting process for miners is somewhat unclear, but a Bitcoin Stack Exchange post provides some information. A follow-up question asks when BIP 100 will be published and moved to 'accepted' status on GitHub. The email comes from odinn via bitcoin-dev and includes a PGP signature.
